abstract: Industry analysts are questioning not whether Motorola will again become dominant but whether the handset division will survive.
snippet: Industry analysts are questioning not whether Motorola will again become dominant but whether the handset division will survive.
lead_paragraph: Motorola has had its ups and downs. Fifteen years ago, a gray brick Motorola handset was synonymous with mobile phone. Sales slipped, but the company came back five years ago with the sleek Razr, the must-have cellphone.

headline.main: Motorola Scrambles to Restore Its Lost Cellphone Glory
headline.print_headline: Motorola Scrambles to Restore Its Lost Cellphone Glory
